hackathon-eligibility: The event is open to individuals and teams.
hackathon-requirements: The submission should be a game that appeals to children aged 5-12 and has incentives. For kids with asthma, the incentive should be to use their controller inhaler every day and for all other kids other healthy behaviors should be encouraged such as eating fruits and vegetables or being physically active. Submimssions should include a 1-minute video pitch and screenshots of the product. A live demo is always a plus.
hackathon-rules:
The event is on Saturday, July 20th and at least one member of the team must attend in person to participate and pitch. We encourage the entire team to be present as we will have mentors providing guidance and answering questions throughout the event.
Complete rules and guidelines will be provided during the event.
hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=1133 15th Street Northwest, Washington, DC 20005, USA
hackathon-description-header: Help kids with asthma and win cash prizes!
